TIDES
TELETYPE SCENE
 
14 X 8 PLAYING SURFACE
CV 3,4 LEVEL CONTROL
 
 
 
#1
Z G.BTNI
IF == 1 G.BTN.V Z: $ 2
 
#2
X G.BTNX; Y * 5 - 7 G.BTNY
JF.VOX O N + X Y V 8
 
#3
G.BTN.SW G.BTNI
CV 3 PN 0 - G.BTNI 200
 
#4
G.BTN.SW G.BTNI
CV 4 PN 0 - G.BTNI 210
 
#5
 
#6
 
#7
 
#8
 
#M
A SCALE 0 16320 10 2000 PRM
L 3 4: CV.SLEW I A
 
#I
G.GBX 1 0 0 0 1 1 0 0 1 14 8
G.GBX 2 200 14 0 1 1 1 5 3 1 8
G.GBX 3 210 15 0 1 1 1 5 4 1 8
JF.MODE 1; JF.SHIFT N -12
O.MIN 1; O.MAX 6
M 50
 
#P
